name: .HE File Extension
summary: Learn about .HE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game resource archive used by Humongous Entertainment games, such as Pajama Sam 4 and Putt-Putt: Pep's Birthday Surprise; contains game resources that make up characters and locations.

content: NOTE: HE archives are mainly used by games that utilize the YAGA engine. You can extract resources from the HE archive with 7-Zip, which makes it easy to modify the resource files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
